本來覺得這個app都幾方便好用， 仲介紹其他人用。但12月尾發生有個不認識的人whatsapp 之後仲打電話比我,我唔認識， 當然唔接電話啦。之後Mox 給我信息, 話有人錯誤入左HKD100比我。1月7日收到Mox信件話叫我1月7日前要回覆信件，否則付上法律集任， 我見封信日子是1月4日， 我立刻當晚回覆銀行同意轉番錢比這人士。 我已經感氣憤， 點解當追債追我錢， 仲咁不合理給時限.
但我更氣憒是銀行之後嘅舉動， 仲打電話追我取回100， 及1月11日寫封掛號信比我追數。

我已經回覆他們， 點解仲追債咁不停滋擾我， 一句抱歉說話都無。 我更不明白點個不明人士知我聯絡電話， 究竟咁大間銀行點解未得我同意下， 給予這陌生人。 整件事是銀行同這陌生人嘅錯誤，點解搞到我好似犯法咁， 收到錢仲不停滋擾我？我是否要報警先可以完結這事。
translatedcontent:
Originally thought this app was quite convenient to use, and introduced others to use it. But at the end of December it happened that an unknown person called me after whatsapp, I did not know, of course did not answer the phone. Then Mox gave me a message that someone mistakenly entered me HKD100. On January 7th I received a letter from Mox telling me to reply to the letter before January 7th, otherwise pay the legal charges, I saw the date of the letter was January 4th, I immediately replied that night to the bank agreeing to transfer the money back to this person. I am already angry, why when debt collection chasing my money, still so unreasonable to give a time limit ...
But I was more upset by the bank's subsequent move, and called me to get back 100, and on January 11 wrote me a registered letter to collect the debt.

I have replied to them, why the debt collection so constantly harassing me, not a word of apology. I further do not understand how an unknown person knows my contact number, exactly why such a large bank has not had my consent, given to this stranger. The whole thing is the bank and this stranger's mistake, why does it make me seem to be breaking the law, receiving money and still nuisance me? Do I need to call the police to end this matter?
